text: Greta Adami (born 30 July 1992) is an Italian footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Italy women's national team. ==Career== Adami has been capped for the Italy national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Italian women's footballers Category:Italy women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Fiorentina Women's F.C. players
title: Greta Adami
